name: Hamsternikus
description:
Mind relocation experiment went completely wrong – a scientist is trapped inside a hamster’s body. Help science and save this hapless fellow!

Take control of a hamster and help it go through a maze with movable walls, solve portal brainteasers and (spoiler alert) even face extraterrestrial threat. YES, all of that stuff is there, check it out!

One could say that the game is just hamster-in-a-ball simulation game, but not developers, developers suppose it to be not less than a metaphoric adventure: there is no obstacle for curious mind … even if it is trapped in a hamster ball
